name: Boom Squad
description:
Boom Squad is a multiplayer 3rd person shooter defined by realistic military weapons, with a focus on cooperative gameplay, in 5 vs 5 online multiplayer matches.Choose Your Role In the SquadChoose between four characters which support the realistic gunplay mechanics. You can pick your role based on your own play style and defeat your opponent with skills, smarts and ultimate reactions.


Sniper
You can defend or help your team mates from a distance with a powerful sniper rifle.

Shotgun Trooper
Be on the first line and scout the enemy base with this powerful close range weapon.

Machine Gun Soldier
Give your team the support they need with a machine gun that compensates its lack of accuracy with the sheer power of fire rate and magazine size.

Assault commando
Use the versatility of the assault rifle to outplay your enemies by taking advantage of its higher fire rate and damage. Watch how you spend your bullets though, as you may find yourself out of ammo.MatchmakingWith every online multiplayer match, the matchmaking sorts through players and creates teams of 5, with complementary abilities and experience. Every match is ranked and in order to progress you need to take your entire squad to the next level.ProgressCustomize your weapons both visually and in terms of performance, by purchasing modular parts (magazines, scopes, vertical grips, muzzles) from the game’s extensive tech tree.
